decks.notes: This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on playing low-cost, evasive creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It includes disruptive spells and removal to control the board and protect your creatures. The deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain tempo throughout the game, using cards like Floodpits Drowner, Spyglass Siren, and Restless Reef to keep up the pressure. By combining aggression with disruption, this deck looks to overwhelm opponents and secure victories through efficient creature combat and strategic spellcasting.

The deck focuses on fast, aggressive gameplay by playing low-cost creatures and spells to pressure the opponent. It also includes some control elements like removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is focused on supporting the Orzhov color combination, allowing for a variety of powerful cards to be played. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruptive spells, leading to a quick victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with a mix of creatures and spells to control the battlefield and push through damage quickly. The deck utilizes a combination of evasive threats like Spyglass Siren and tricky spells like Phantom Interference to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily increasing pressure with creatures like Enduring Curiosity and Floodpits Drowner. By maintaining a balance of aggression and disruption, this Dimir Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to deal damage quickly and efficiently through a combination of direct damage spells and powerful creature attacks. By playing efficiently and utilizing the resources available, the deck aims to end the game before the opponent can stabilize and turn the tables. With a strong emphasis on speed and aggression, this deck aims to win the game as quickly as possible through a combination of direct damage and overwhelming board presence.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on a combination of aggressive creatures and disruption spells to control the board and put pressure on the opponent. By utilizing cards like Spyglass Siren and Azure Beastbinder to quickly establish a board presence, while also having access to removal spells like Tragic Trajectory and Stab to deal with threats, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victories through fast and efficient play. The inclusion of cards like Bitter Triumph and Soulstone Sanctuary also provides the deck with additional utility and versatility in different matchups.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively push the tempo with fast and efficient creatures and burn spells. By using a mix of direct damage spells and powerful creatures like Burnout Bashtronaut and Nova Hellkite, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero. The inclusion of cards like Soulstone Sanctuary and Witchstalker Frenzy helps to maintain card advantage and protect key creatures, while Riverpyre Verge and Rockface Village provide additional mana sources for casting spells. Overall, this deck is designed to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless onslaught of damage.

This aggressive red deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent using low-cost creatures and direct damage spells. The deck includes powerful finishers like Nova Hellkite and Burnout Bashtronaut to close out the game. The inclusion of cards like Hired Claw and Screaming Nemesis helps maintain early pressure on the opponent. With a mix of burn spells and efficient creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a fast victory.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively attack and burn down the opponent's life points using a combination of low-cost creatures with pump effects and direct damage spells. The deck is heavily focused on dealing damage quickly and efficiently, with cards like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike providing direct damage to the opponent, while creatures like Hired Claw and Nova Hellkite put pressure on the opponent's life total. The deck aims to close out games as quickly as possible before the opponent has a chance to stabilize and turn the game around.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using low-cost creatures and combat tricks. The deck focuses on playing creatures early on to apply pressure, while also utilizing card draw and protection spells to maintain board presence. The key is to outpace the opponent with efficient creatures and pump spells, aiming to deal lethal damage quickly before the opponent can stabilize. The deck aims to win by developing a strong board presence and maintaining pressure throughout the game.

This deck relies on aggressive plays and quick tempo to overwhelm opponents. It has a mix of spell and creature cards to maintain board control and deal damage efficiently. The deck also includes some card draw and mana fixing to ensure a consistent flow of threats. With a mix of burn spells, creature buffs, and versatile creatures, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By ramping up mana with cards like Multiversal Passage and Riverpyre Verge, you can accelerate into powerful threats like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier. Proft's Eidetic Memory allows for card advantage, while Quantum Riddler and Fear of Missing Out put pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Abrade and Torch the Tower to handle threats, making it a fast-paced and efficient aggro deck.

This deck focuses on utilizing a mix of powerful creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. It combines aggressive creatures like Marang River Regent and Superior Spider-Man with spell cards like Bitter Triumph and Awaken the Honored Dead to maintain board presence and pressure the opponent. The deck also includes utility lands like Cavern of Souls and Underground Mortuary to support its strategy. By using a combination of creatures and spells, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and outpace the opponent to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm and control the opponent through a mix of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By using cards like Bitter Triumph, Spyglass Siren, and Floodpits Drowner, the deck aims to establish board dominance and maintain a strong tempo advantage. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Strategic Betrayal allows for strategic removal and disruption of the opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck excels at applying pressure early in the game and maintaining control throughout the match.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive red creatures and burn spells. It aims to control the board early on with efficient removal spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, while also putting pressure with creatures like Burnout Bashtronaut and Hired Claw. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Nova Hellkite and Ojer Axonil, Deepest Might to close out the game. Overall, this deck thrives on fast-paced aggression and direct damage to defeat the opponent before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and lifegain. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while drawing cards and gaining incremental advantage through card advantage and lifegain effects. The deck also utilizes a mix of creatures and planeswalkers to pressure the opponent and close out the game once it has established control. The key is to carefully manage resources and make efficient use of spells to outvalue the opponent and secure victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with a combination of creatures and spells to control the board and deal damage quickly to the opponent. It utilizes a mix of flying creatures, card draw, disruption, and removal spells to maintain momentum and tempo. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and seize control of the game before the opponent can stabilize. With a blend of evasive threats and disruptive elements, it looks to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory through efficient and aggressive gameplay.
